item.title: Leftism is a DUMPSTER FIRE! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ August 01, 2024
In this episode of Liberty Dispatch, Andrew and Matty break down the static Marxist roots of the 2024 Olympic Opening Ceremony and just how Leftism sets the world ablaze. 

Segment 1 - News Brief:

"Bonnie Henry and Adrian Dix Making Announcement About COVID-19" | Kamloops BC Now
https://www.kamloopsbcnow.com/watercooler/news/news/COVID_19/Bonnie_Henry_and_Adrian_Dix_making_announcement_about_COVID_19/#fs_139226

"COVID-19 Vaccine Mandates Lifted for Health Care Workers" | Vancouver Sun
https://vancouversun.com/news/covid-19-vaccine-mandates-lifted-health-care-workers

"Canadian AG Asks Court to Dismiss Lawsuit Against Gov't for Imposing COVID Jab Travel Mandate" | LifeSiteNews
https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/canadian-ag-asks-court-to-dismiss-lawsuit-against-govt-for-imposing-covid-jab-travel-mandate

"ArriveCAN Charges Dropped, Shielding the Controversial Program from Constitutional Scrutiny" | Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedoms
https://www.jccf.ca/arrivecan-charges-dropped-shielding-the-controversial-program-from-constitutional-scrutiny

"Betrayed: How Public Health Misled Pregnant and Breastfeeding Mothers About COVID Vaccine Safety" | Rebel News
https://www.rebelnews.com/betrayed_how_public_health_misled_pregnant_and_breastfeeding_mothers_about_covid_vaccine_safety

"R. v. Fernando Ruling Transcript" | WSIMG
https://img1.wsimg.com/blobby/go/9b59c1b0-ca6d-473d-a5c2-7500cca04efd/downloads/R.%20v.%20Fernando_Ruling_Transcript_26_June_2024.pdf?ver=1720652624220

Segment 2 :

"JO 2024: Cérémonie Ouverture Image Cène Religion Adhère Applaudit Big Bertha" | 20 Minutes
https://www.20minutes.fr/arts-stars/culture/4103300-20240727-jo-2024-ceremonie-ouverture-image-cene-religion-adhere-applaudit-big-bertha

"Scott Smith's Tweet on COVID Announcement" | Twitter
https://x.com/scottsmith8100/status/1817920866644083086

"Scott Smith's Tweet on Biden" | Twitter
https://x.com/kylenabecker/status/1816977236085416353

"Benny Johnson's Tweet on COVID" | Twitter
https://x.com/bennyjohnson/status/1817238104048124150

Segment 3:

"WSWS on COVID" | World Socialist Web Site
https://www.wsws.org/en/articles/2024/07/27/sxsc-j27.html

"Blame BC Liberals for Forest Fires" | The Tyee
https://thetyee.ca/Opinion/2017/08/15/Blame-BC-Liberals-for-Forest-Fires

"Opinion: Green Forest Policy Turned Jasper into a Tinderbox" | Edmonton Journal
https://edmontonjournal.com/opinion/columnists/opinion-green-forest-policy-turned-jasper-into-a-tinderbox

"Climate Change is Making Each Day Slightly Longer, and There's No Sign It's Going to Stop: NASA" | CTV News
https://www.ctvnews.ca/climate-and-environment/climate-change-is-making-each-day-slightly-longer-and-there-s-no-sign-it-s-going-to-stop-nasa-says-1.6961637

"Exclusive: Docs Suggest Trudeau Exerted Influence Over Toronto Police" | Rebel News
https://www.rebelnews.com/exclusive_docs_suggest_trudeau_exerted_influence_over_toronto_police

"Trudeau Pledges Another $500 Million to Ukraine as Canadian Military Suffers" | LifeSiteNews
https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/trudeau-pledges-another-500-million-to-ukraine-as-canadian-military-suffers

item.title: BIDEN RESIGNS?: DNC Mafia KILLS Biden's Re-Election Campaign, Taps VP COMMIE-la Harris [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ July 25, 2024
In this episode of Liberty Dispatch, Andrew and Matty post-mortem Joe Biden's aborted re-election campaign and the rise of VP COMMIE-la Harris.

Segment 1 - News Brief:
"Sexual Assault Charge Against Megachurch Pastor Bruxy Cavey Stayed Over Delays" | The Star:
https://www.thestar.com/news/investigations/sexual-assault-charge-against-megachurch-pastor-bruxy-cavey-stayed-over-delays/article_3973397a-4839-11ef-8c89-6391a1198e72.html;
"Worldwide Microsoft Outage Impacts Airports, Banks, TV Broadcasts" | Western Standard:
https://www.westernstandard.news/news/worldwide-microsoft-outage-impacts-airports-banks-tv-broadcasts/56173;
"KFC Bans Pork, Offers Halal Chicken to Make Soul Food Menu More Diverse and Inclusive in Canada" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/kfc-bans-pork-offers-halal-chicken-to-make-soul-food-menu-more-diverse-and-inclusive-in-canada;
"Canada is Now the Car Theft Capital of the World: Report" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/canada-is-now-the-car-theft-capital-of-the-world-report?utm_content=;

Segment 2 - 2024 PRIDE COMES BEFORE THE FALL RECAP:

"Maze Moore's Tweet on Biden" | Twitter: https://x.com/mazemoore/status/1806556780979175820;
"Charlie Kirk's Tweet on Biden" | Twitter: https://x.com/charliekirk11/status/1811795013208277145;
"Biden Letter to Withdraw Harris Endorsement" | NPR: https://www.npr.org/2024/07/21/g-s1-12544/biden-letter-withdraw-harris-endorsement;
"Biden Announces He's Stepping Down From Being Dems' Presidential Candidate" | Western Standard:
https://www.westernstandard.news/international/breaking-biden-announces-hes-stepping-down-from-being-dems-presidential-candidate/55754;
"Shawn Farash's Tweet on Harris" | Twitter: https://x.com/Shawn_Farash/status/1815089874095194458;
"Kamala Harris Receives Enough Delegate Support to Win Democrat Presidential Nomination" | LifeSiteNews:
https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/kamala-harris-receives-enough-delegate-support-to-win-democrat-presidential-nomination;


Segment 3 - THE LIBS ARE LOSING IT!:
"UN Says Global Child Vaccination Rates Below Pre-Pandemic Levels" | Zero Hedge:
https://www.zerohedge.com/medical/un-says-global-child-vaccination-rates-below-pre-pandemic-levels;
"The Economist: WPATH Research on Trans Medicine Manipulated" | SEGM:
https://www.segm.org/The-Economist-WPATH-Research-Trans-Medicine-Manipulated;
"Vancouver Opioid Crisis: Drug Addiction in British Columbia, Canada" | The Telegraph:
https://www.telegraph.co.uk/global-health/climate-and-people/vancouver-opioid-crisis-drug-addiction-british-columbia-canada;
"Alberta Nurse Told Author Heather Hancock She Was Selfish for Not Getting MAID" | The Post Millennial:
https://thepostmillennial.com/alberta-nurse-told-author-heather-hancock-she-was-selfish-for-not-getting-maid?utm_content=;
"More Disabled Canadians Are Speaking Out Against Pressure to Choose Assisted Suicide" | LifeSiteNews:
https://www.lifesitenews.com/blogs/more-disabled-canadians-are-speaking-out-against-pressure-to-choose-assisted-suicide.
